TopicTitle: Theres no saves and screenshots in my ksp install?

Articles.Content: Hello, so i am trying to move an install of ksp 0.25 from one laptop to another. The original laptop has windows vista and new one has windows 7. There is no screenshots folder in original install and there are no saves, but when i launch ksp on my original laptop, the saved games are there, ready to be played. Theres my career mode (50% completed, im affraid to loose it). Where can i find my saves in windows vista laptop?

I'm going to guess you are using steam. In which case I steam redirects the saves. I think they end up somewhere in the documents folder, but I don't know for sure.

-Claw
If they're not there, you may have luck finding them in the %APPDATA% folder.

In my case KSP saves them in the install location.

...\Steam\SteamApps\common\Kerbal Space Program\saves

For easier finding search for *.sfs files. Those are the save files.

lol least you have them somewhere , my saves games seem to be deleted on exiting game at odd points one day they save permanently next day every thing saved from that day gone , I certainly hope they address this or make saving games as in career easier to do
